casebody.data:
CONSUMERS ENERGY COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ADRIAN & BLISSFIELD RAIL ROAD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant,
and
City of Adrian, Department of Transportation, Norfolk Southern Corporation, and Norfolk Southern Railway Company, Defendants. SC: 157926
COA: 341216 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 7, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
